page.shortlink: api objects security object add user to role method
page.description: Adds a user to the supplied role.
page.prototype: Context.Security.AddUserToRole as L (UserName as C, RoleName as C)

argument.name: RoleName
argument.description: The name of the role to which the user will be added.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns .T. if the role was added; otherwise .F.

page.discussion: Context.Security.AddUserToRole() adds a user to the supplied role. Check *[link:Context.Security.CallResult.Success@./index.xml#section1_CallResult]* before using the return value.
